keyword: how many calories in a jack in the box taco
title: How Many Calories in a Jack in the Box Taco?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Jack in the Box taco, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Jack in the Box Taco?
assumptions: Standard Jack in the Box taco: deep-fried corn tortilla with seasoned beef, cheddar cheese, lettuce, and taco sauce; as served.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations. Values based on official data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Jack in the Box taco contains about 190 calories and 8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Jack in the Box taco?
What is the protein in a Jack in the Box taco?
faqs.a: About 8 g of protein per taco.

faqs.q: Are Jack in the Box tacos high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 410 mg sodium per taco due to seasoning and sauce.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a Jack in the Box taco?
faqs.a: Roughly 16 g carbs, including 2 g fiber, per taco.

faqs.q: Do Jack in the Box tacos have trans fat?
faqs.a: About 0.5 g trans fat per taco from the frying process.
